001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.zeromq;
002
003import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Flowable;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
006import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ChainTip;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.Disposable;
008import org.bitcoinj.core.Block;
009import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
010import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.util.BlockUtil;
011
012import java.net.URI;
013
014import static java.lang.System.out;
015
016/**
017 * Sample Bitcoin ZMQ client
018 */
019public class SampleBitcoinZmqClient {
020
021    public static void main(String[] args) {
022        Network network = BitcoinNetwork.MAINNET;
023        String rpcUser = "";
024        String rpcPassword = "";
025        URI rpcUri = URI.create("http://localhost:8332");
026
027        try (RxBitcoinZmqService client = new RxBitcoinZmqService(network, rpcUri, rpcUser, rpcPassword)) {
028            // Subscribe to Blocks
029            Disposable disposable = Flowable.fromPublisher(client.blockPublisher())
030                    .subscribe(SampleBitcoinZmqClient::onBlock, SampleBitcoinZmqClient::onError);
031
032            // Subscribe to ChainTips
033            Disposable disposable2 = Flowable.fromPublisher(client.chainTipPublisher())
034                    .subscribe(SampleBitcoinZmqClient::onChainTip, SampleBitcoinZmqClient::onError);
035
036
037            // Blocking subscribe to Transactions (so main() doesn't finish)
038            Flowable.fromPublisher(client.transactionPublisher())
039                    .blockingSubscribe(SampleBitcoinZmqClient::onTx, SampleBitcoinZmqClient::onError);
040
041            disposable.dispose();
042        }
043    }
044
045    static void onBlock(Block block) {
046        out.println("Raw block");
047        out.printf("Block version: %s\n", block.getVersion());
048        out.printf("Raw Block: %s/%s containing %s transactions\n",
049                BlockUtil.blockHeightFromCoinbase(block),
050                block.getHash(),
051                block.getTransactions().size());
052
053    }
054
055    static void onChainTip(ChainTip tip) {
056        out.printf("Chain tip: %s/%s\n", tip.getHeight(), tip.getHash());
057    }
058
059    static void onTx(Transaction tx) {
060        out.printf("Raw Tx: %s, value: %s\n",
061                tx.getTxId(),
062                tx.getOutputSum().toPlainString());
063    }
064
065    static void onError(Throwable t) {
066        out.println("Error: " + t);
067    }
068
069}
